creator: Ancient Ocean Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Read some of the Best Indian stories in Hindi. This app has a huge collection of all entertaining, inspirational, moral and religious Hindi stories. More than 500 didactic Hindi stories of great authors like Munshi Premchand, Ravindra Nath Tagore, Mahadevi Verma and from world famous series of Mahabharat, Panchtantra, Akbar Birbal, Tenaliram, Singhasan Battessee, Vikram Betal and more.

Also, you can listen stories in Hindi by clicking on 'कहानी सुनिए' button provided on each story page.

The App contains 500+ stories from:

Munshi Premchnd (मुंशी प्रेमचंद)
Ravindra Nath Tagore (रविंद्र नाथ टैगोर)
Mahadevi Verma (महादेवी वर्मा)
Mahabharat (महाभारत)
Pauranik Stories (पौराणिक कहानियाँ)
Panchtantra (पंचतंत्र)
Akbar Birbal (अकबर बीरबल)
Tenaliram (तेनालीराम)
Mulla Nasaruddeen (मुल्ला नसरुद्दीन)
Singhasan Batteesee (सिंघासन बत्तीसी)
Vikram Betal (विक्रम बेताल)
Alif Laila (अलिफ़ लैला)
Daadi Maa Stories (दादी माँ की कहानियाँ )
Moral Stories (शिक्षा प्रद कहानियाँ)

Features:

Availibility: All stories are readable offline. No internet connection required.
Audio: Listen stories when you dont want to read.
User Interface: Attractive, responsive UI
Share: Easily share the app link to your friends.
descriptionShort: Best Hindi stories with audio from Mahabharat, Panchtantra, Akbar Birbal & more.
title: Hindi Stories - रोचक हिंदी कहानियाँ

title: Hindi Stories - सर्वश्रेष्ठ रोचक हिंदी कहानियाँ

creator: Ancient Ocean Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Read Indian stories in Hindi. Discover this app, that has a huge collection of more than 500 didactic, entertaining, inspirational, moral, and religious Hindi stories. Here you can read Bedtime Hindi stories of famous Indian authors, moral stories and also Indian mythological stories and Indian folk tales.

Also, you can listen to stories in Hindi by clicking on the button provided on top of each story page.

The App contains 500+ stories from following writers and categories:

मुंशी प्रेमचंद - Munshi Premchand
रवींद्र नाथ टैगोर - Rabindranath Tagore
महादेवी वर्मा - Mahadevi Verma
महाभारत - Mahabharat
पौराणिक कहानियां - Pauranik Stories
पञ्चतन्त्र - Panchatantra
अकबर बीरबल - Akbar Birbal
तेनालीराम - Tenaliram

Features:

Availability: All stories are readable offline. No internet connection is required.
Audio: Listen to stories when you don't want to read.
User Interface: Attractive, responsive UI
Share: Easily share the app link with your friends.
descriptionShort: Hindi stories with audio from Mahabharat, Panchtantra, Akbar Birbal & more.
title: Hindi Stories With Audio
